races.name: Inin
races.description: Inin Description: Inin stand at about 5-6 ft tall, weighing approximately 120-200 lbs on average. Inin have standard length pointed ears. Inin are the most numerous species by far on Adûrun, and thus the most varied in their appearances, cultures, and demeanors. Inin typically live 80-120 years. Inin seemingly have less survival instincts than average, and are oftentimes more warlike, but on the other side of that coin, are far more spirited and willing to endure hardship.

races.name: Anz
races.description: Anz Description: Anz stand at about 12-15 ft tall, and weigh approximately 600-700 lbs on average. Anz have long saber-like ears about the length of one’s forearm and white eyes with no irises or pupils. Anz have a naturally low fat content, broad features, coarse woolly black hair, caramel, coffee, or umber brown skin, and put on muscle faster than the other species. Anz value tranquility and are stoic in demeanor due to a quickness to anger that plagues them. Anz live about 60-100 years on average. Anz are a large creature.

races.name: Phi’ilin
races.description: Phi’ilin Description: A Phi’iel stands at about 6-8ft tall, and weighs approximately 300-400 lbs on average. Phi’ilin have long, knife-length pointed ears with fair features, and silver eyes and fine hair. Despite a lithe and slender visage, Phi’ilin are heavy due to extremely dense muscle mass, which gives them superior strength and speed for their size. Phi’ilin live for 800-1200 years on average. Phi’ilin maintain a graceful and haughty utilitarian-obsessed disposition that can slowly change to one of despair, chaos, and loathing with long memories to match their long lifespans.

races.name: Cerevu
races.description: Cerevu Description: Cerevu typically stand at about 4-5 ft tall, weighing about 200-300 lbs on average. Cerevu have rounded ears and are hairier than the other species, but are otherwise androgynous, as the other species are unsure of how Cerevu reproduce. Cerevu tend to be rounder and squatter in shape. Cerevu live around 150-200 years on average. Cerevu tend to have a very calm and tranquil disposition, and value quiet and industriousness above all else.

races.name: Venii
races.description: Venii Description: Venii usually stand at 6-8 ft tall, weighing approximately 120-200 lbs on average. Venii have jet black smooth chitinous skin, fine stark white hair, and glossy reflective eyes with arachnoid faces and pedipalps, which they almost always keep veiled or hidden from non-Venii. Venii have stringy, scrawny, tall, and slender builds, who otherwise seem like Phi’ilin. Venii typically live 150-200 years on average. Venii maintains an attempted pleasant attitude but suffers from a terribly awkward disposition.

races.name: Freinin
races.description:
Freinin Description: Freinin usually stand at about half an Inin’s height, weighing approximately a quarter as much on average as well. Freinin come in all shapes and sizes, but are considered small creatures. Freinin have a variety of skin, hair, and eye colors. Freinin typically live 60-80 years on average. Freinin, called “humans” or “mankind” in their own tongues and native to Adûrun, maintain a variety of demeanors, but generally speaking, tend to be characterized as frail and craven, or at least, quite risk-averse compared to the other species. Freinin cannot Link.
Languages: Two of the player’s choice

subraces.name: Thairin
subraces.description:
Appearance: Black curly hair, shorter and hairier than average, dark brown eyes, olive skin
Languages: Thairin, one of the player’s choice

subraces.name: Grazin
subraces.description:
Appearance: Fine blonde hair, broader and taller than average, blue eyes, pale skin
Languages: Grazin, one of the player’s choice

subraces.name: Bryonin
subraces.description:
Appearance: Black hair, red eyes, pale skin
Languages: Bryonin, Narinduilin

subraces.name: Jiinin
subraces.description:
Fine black hair, almond-shaped brown eyes, less hairy than average, shorter and thinner on average, pale or olive skin
Languages: Yaich, one of the player’s choice

subraces.name: Rivanonin
subraces.description:
Appearance: Pale brown hair, pale brown eyes, pale skin
Languages: Narinduilin

subraces.name: Melfarionin
subraces.description:
Appearance: Dirty blonde hair, bright golden eyes, pale or bronze skin
Languages: Melfaric, two languages of the player’s choice

subraces.name: Thuilin
subraces.description:
Appearance: Black hair, bright silver-rimmed irises in eyes, pale skin
Languages: Narinduilin

subraces.name: Letelin
subraces.description:
Appearance: Thick dark brown hair, dark brown eyes, pale skin
Languages: Felani, Narinduilin

statusEffects.name: Blessed
statusEffects.description: Under a positive Divine Intervention or a magic item's effect.

statusEffects.name: Blinded
statusEffects.description: -100 to search, track, forage, interpret, identify, and navigate based on vision. -100 to battle if no special senses allow you to sense presences without clear vision.

statusEffects.name: Burning
statusEffects.description: Gain 1 Burn Wound per round.

statusEffects.name: Charmed
statusEffects.description: Magically allied to a creature.

statusEffects.name: Crushing
statusEffects.description: Gain 1 Blunt Wound per round.

statusEffects.name: Cursed
statusEffects.description: Under a negative Divine Intervention or a magic item's effect.

statusEffects.name: Dazed
statusEffects.description: Reduced to 0 Action Points.

statusEffects.name: Deafened
statusEffects.description: -100 to search, track, forage, interpret, identify, and navigate based on sound. -100 to battle if no special senses allow you to sense presences without clear hearing.

statusEffects.name: Enraged
statusEffects.description: +25 to physical-based skills and -25 to mental-based skills; current morale penalties are ignored while enraged.

statusEffects.name: Freezing
statusEffects.description: Gain 1 Freeze Wound per round.

statusEffects.name: Hastened
statusEffects.description: Under an effect that increases action points.

statusEffects.name: Intoxicated
statusEffects.description: -15 to all non-Will skills, +15 to Will skills.

statusEffects.name: Bleeding
statusEffects.description: Gain 1 Laceration Wound per round.

statusEffects.name: Prone
statusEffects.description: On ground. Movement takes 2 energy. -50 to battle against standing targets in melee. +50 to defending against ranged attacks and concealing self.

statusEffects.name: Rended
statusEffects.description: Gain 1 Spiritual Wound per round.

statusEffects.name: Rotting
statusEffects.description: Gain 1 Necrosis Wound per round.

statusEffects.name: Slowed
statusEffects.description: Under an effect that decreases action points.

statusEffects.name: Stupification
statusEffects.description: Gain 1 Mental Wound per round.

statusEffects.name: Suffocating
statusEffects.description: Increasing exhaustion/physical mod rounds.

statusEffects.name: Unconscious
statusEffects.description: Unable to act or perceive your environment.
